thread.title: Put in place mechanism to verify mobile users’ identities: Supreme Court tells Centre
thread.title_full: Put in place mechanism to verify mobile users’ identities: Supreme Court tells Centre

author: FE Online
title: Put in place mechanism to verify mobile users’ identities: Supreme Court tells Centre
text:
Put in place mechanism to verify mobile users’ identities: Supreme Court tells Centre Put in place mechanism to verify mobile users’ identities: Supreme Court tells Centre Verification of people who buy new mobile phones and SIM cards has become more important as mobile phones are now being used for banking purposes also. By: FE Online | New Delhi   12:49 PM The Supreme Court of India. 
The Supreme Court of India has asked the Central government to frame new policies for the telecom sector within a year, which will include new rules and regulations to verify identities of existing mobile users so that SIM cards are not misused. Verification of people who buy new mobile phones and SIM cards has become more important as mobile phones are now being used for banking purposes also, said apex court. 
(Further details awaited)
